titles.title: Natural Stock Conservation Act of 2007
A bill to amend the National Aquaculture Act of 1980 to prohibit the issuance of permits for marine aquaculture facilities until requirements for the permits are enacted into law.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1787)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
2/8/2007--Introduced.
Natural Stock Conservation Act of 2007 - Amends the National Aquaculture Act of 1980 to prohibit specified agencies with aquaculture regulatory jurisdiction from issuing permits for marine aquaculture facilities in the exclusive economic zone until requirements for such permits are enacted into law.
